author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Try to address the issue of RPC geometry. Address the difference between DDD and DD4hep versions

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix methods

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gex163 Try to address the issue of RPC geometry
